anyways, balloons was originally Hiddow's game, started out in GM8
eventually Hiddow got Plasma on to help make it, as well as some other makers to make various bosses, stages, secrets, and etc.
then it got ported to GMS1, and Plasma took over as the main dev
then the trailer came out (see the imgur link)
then the game got delayed, then ported to GMS2
and now we're here

the problem with feeling bad for people who say like "oh if i knew it was happening i would have joined ü•∫ " is that after GBC ended i got told by kittygame, Renko, Driek, tamano, and Nearigami that they all regretted not joining, so i went out of my way to specifically tell all of them when GTC was happening. none of them joined.
IN THEIR DEFENSE this was after magic tower collab and yump both failed
so i don't blame them for not joining
